alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Mountains; Sonoma Coastal Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 28 at 2:26AM PDT until March 28 at 12:00PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PDT TODAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Marin Coastal Range and Coastal North Bay, Including Point Reyes National Seashore. * WHEN...Until noon PDT today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds are expected for the Marin coastline as well as high elevations of the Marin coastal mountain range. Localized areas of higher terrain could see gusts greater than 45 mph.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Mountains; Sonoma Coastal Range
